channel.title: 'Java' is not found as inte
channel.description:
I feel stupid for asking this but I don't know. I keep getting this when I try to open my client. It just started doing this.
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
Help?

item.title: 'Java' is not found as inte
item.dc:creator: @Dark_Fantasy Dark Fantasy
item.description:
@Dark_Fantasy wrote:

Ok dude I figured it out.

Install Java JDK1.6.0_06. And the JRE Version also.

In Enviormental Values Look for Variable Name: CLASSPATH

Change the Value to this: CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;

That is the EXACT thing you need just copy and paste.

In Enviormental Values Look for Variable Name: PATH

Change the Value to this: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;

If everything is correct it will work!

Read full topic
